languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс разочарованно прищуривается.{/n} "Прискорбное потакание врагам Человечества, Вольный Торговец. И своей нетвердой воле".
{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс разочарованно прищуривается.{/n} "Прискорбное потакание врагам Человечества, Вольный Торговец. И своей нетвердой воле".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix squints his eyes in disappointment.{/n} "A most deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity. And your own weak will."
{n}Heinrix squints his eyes in disappointment.{/n} "A most deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity. And your own weak will."
{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."
{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."
{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

languages.text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛，看起来很失望。{/n}“行商浪人，你薄弱的意志已经屈从于人类之敌的邪恶诱惑。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛，看起来很失望。{/n}“行商浪人，你薄弱的意志已经屈从于人类之敌的邪恶诱惑。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entorna los ojos, decepcionado.{/n} «Una indulgencia deplorable para con los enemigos de la Humanidad, Comerciante Independiente. Su voluntad es débil».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entorna los ojos, decepcionado.{/n} «Una indulgencia deplorable para con los enemigos de la Humanidad, Comerciante Independiente. Su voluntad es débil».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux, l'air déçu.{/n} « Vous faites preuve d'une indulgence déplorable à l'adresse des ennemis de l'humanité, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'imagine que cela reflète simplement votre manque de volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux, l'air déçu.{/n} « Vous faites preuve d'une indulgence déplorable à l'adresse des ennemis de l'humanité, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'imagine que cela reflète simplement votre manque de volonté. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kneift enttäuscht die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Inakzeptable Duldung von Feinden der Menschheit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Und Euer eigener schwacher Wille."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kneift enttäuscht die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Inakzeptable Duldung von Feinden der Menschheit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Und Euer eigener schwacher Wille."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、落胆している。{/n}「人類の敵の許容は非難すべきことです、自由開拓者。また、陛下自身の意志が弱いせいでもある」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、落胆している。{/n}「人類の敵の許容は非難すべきことです、自由開拓者。また、陛下自身の意志が弱いせいでもある」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hayal kırıklığı içinde gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı acınası bir hoşgörü gösteriyorsun Hür Tacir. İradesizliğin, kararlarına yansıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes, disappointed.{/n} "Deplorable indulgence of the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. And of your own weak will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, hayal kırıklığı içinde gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın Düşmanlarının acınası müsamahası, Hür Tacir. Bir de kendi iradenin."
